english.segment1: What about God. What about God. Where am I that I don't feel him anymore. Can a man go so far. that he doesn't feel the presence of his closest friend. What about God. What about God. Where am I that I don't see him working anymore. Can a man go so far. that he doesn't feel the presence of his closest friend. Can a man go so far. that he doesn't feel the presence of his only friend
english.segment2: What about God. What about God. What about God. What about God
